## WorldEventPayloads."WORLD.SET\_DIRECTIONAL\_LIGHT\_INTENSITY" property

Emitted when the intensity of the world's directional light is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[WorldEvent.SET_DIRECTIONAL_LIGHT_INTENSITY]: {
        world: World;
        intensity: number;
    };
```
